Class ProjectileFactory

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.factories.projectilefactories.ProjectileFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Factory<Projectile>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemyProjectileFactory, PlayerProjectileFactory
public class ProjectileFactory extends Object implements Factory<Projectile>, Serializable
Factory class for creating projectiles. The ProjectileFactory is responsible for initializing a new projectile based on a template and setting its direction, rotation, position, and collider.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectileFactory

      public ProjectileFactory(Projectile projectileTemplate, float radiusOfAttacker, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 positionOfAttacker)
      Constructs a new ProjectileFactory.
      Parameters:
      projectileTemplate - The template projectile to use for creating new projectiles.
      radiusOfAttacker - The radius of the attacker that fires the projectile.
      positionOfAttacker - The position of the attacker that fires the projectile.

    • create

      public Projectile create(Object... direction)
      Creates a new projectile based on the provided direction vector. The new projectile is a clone of the template with the specified direction, rotation, and position. The collider's position is also adjusted according to the projectile's size.
      Specified by:
      create in interface Factory<Projectile>
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which the projectile will move (as a Vector2).
      Returns:
      A new projectile instance with the specified properties.
